mapper.insert: insert into store (store_product, store_price, store_photo, store_content, store_category) values(#{store_product},#{store_price},#{store_photo},#{store_content},#{store_category})
mapper.select: select * from store order by store_num
select num from member where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into storecart (store_num, member_num, cart_cnt, cart_day) values(#{store_num}, #{member_num}, #{cart_cnt}, now())
mapper.select: select c.cart_idx, s.store_product, s.store_photo, s.store_price, c.cart_cnt, c.cart_day from storecart c, store s, member m where c.store_num = s.store_num and c.member_num = m.num and m.id=#{id} order by c.cart_idx
mapper.update: update storecart set cart_cnt=#{cart_cnt} where cart_idx=#{cart_idx}
